question: Which of the following assumed the title of Dakshinapathapati?
explanation: The Kings of Satavahana dynasty used matronyms such as Gautamiputra and Vashishthiputra, although they were not matrilineal or matriarchal in any sense. The Satavahanas assumed the title of Dakshinapathapati which means Lord of the Dakshinapatha.
